title: "The silence of the media" on the reduction of the national debt by 12B during Trump's first month?
subtitle: Although President Trump mentioned precise figures of national debt in a tweet, the authenticity of this information was questionable.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The media ' s lack of interest in reducing national debt by $12 billion during the first month of President Trump ' s tenure is due to biased news coverage.
